name: DDN AI Complete Workflow - Phase 3 Final

parameters.query: SELECT build_id, status, created_at FROM build_metadata WHERE job_name = '={{$json.job_name}}' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10

parameters.jsCode: return { message: 'Skipped: Less than 3 failures', build_id: $json.build_id };

parameters.query: INSERT INTO failure_analysis (build_id, error_category, root_cause, fix_recommendation, confidence_score, consecutive_failures, feedback_requested, created_at) VALUES ('={{$json.build_id}}', '={{$json.error_category}}', '={{$json.root_cause}}', '={{$json.fix_recommendation}}', ={{$json.confidence_score}}, ={{$('Build Context + 3-Failure Rule').item.json.consecutive_failures}}, true, NOW()) RETURNING id

parameters.bodyParametersJson:
={
  "build_id": "{{$('Merge Paths').item.json.build_id}}",
  "job_name": "{{$('Build Context + 3-Failure Rule').item.json.job_name}}",
  "error_category": "{{$('Merge Paths').item.json.error_category}}",
  "root_cause": "{{$('Merge Paths').item.json.root_cause}}",
  "fix_recommendation": "{{$('Merge Paths').item.json.fix_recommendation}}",
  "confidence_score": {{$('Merge Paths').item.json.confidence_score}},
  "consecutive_failures": {{$('Build Context + 3-Failure Rule').item.json.consecutive_failures}},
  "build_url": "{{$('Build Context + 3-Failure Rule').item.json.build_url}}"
}
